biography.value: Thwad Underbrew is a former champion of Gorm Gulthyn (the dwarven god of vigilance) who long ago set out to rid Undermountain of the evil that is Halaster Blackcloak. Halaster defeated Underbrew but offered to spare the dwarf’s life if he vowed to serve the Mad Mage as an enforcer, ridding the dungeon of other invaders. Unwilling to face his own mortal end, Underbrew made this vow and convinced himself over time that the executions he performed were acts of mercy, because those he killed would never be forced to turn against their beliefs as he had. In time, these acts stopped weighing on Underbrew’s conscience. In fact, the dwarf began to enjoy his grisly work.

source.book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

description.value: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.

Thwad makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage, plus [[/damage 2d6 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage if Thwad has more than half of his total hit points remaining.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

description.value:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, plus [[/damage 2d6 type=piercing average=true]] damage if Thwad has more than half of his total hit points remaining.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

description.value:
Indomitable (2/Day). Thwad rerolls a failed saving throw.

description.value:
Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest). As a bonus action, Thwad can regain [[/damage 20 type=heal average=false]] hit points.

description.value:
Dwarven Resilience. Thwad has resistance to &Reference[poison]{poison} damage, and advantage on saving throws against &Reference[poison]{poison}.
